message.body: There's another Penn research study thing. LCD. Did you get an email about it? And are you gonna participate? This one is all about texting and chatting so no phone calls. Let me know if you're gonna do it cause you're actually allowed to team up this time .
Oh cool! I think I did get the email
When did you get the email? I think I deleted it cause I thought it was spam
I remember looking at it and thinking it was spam hah
So you're entered into a weekly drawing for a chance to win but you don't get paid unless you win the contest
Not sure. I didn't get to finish it. Working on my broken car
